Bartering and trades: You may exchange valuable services or goods for other products or services without using paper money.
Gift card: Companies would issue gift cards in place of paper money for services like online shopping, food and entertainment businesses, giving them flexibility to use them anywhere.
Cryptocurrency: You could use digital virtual currencies like Bitcoin for your transactions. You may need a digital wallet to own and use these currencies.
Store cards and rewards cards: Many stores and companies have their own card systems, such as Target, Wal-Mark, grocery stores, clubs, etc.
Cashless shopping: Some stores have a store card system, allowing you to charge items directly to your card and you get rewards for using the card.
